t: Amerock Corporation | Encyclopedia.com
s: Based in Rockford, Illinois, Amerock Corporation is a leading U.S. manufacturer of cabinet hardware and storage systems. The company is part of Newell Rubbermaid Inc.’s Levolor Hardware Group. Amerock manufactures products under a number of different brand names, including Accentz, Accuride, ...

t: Amerock - Wikipedia
s: September 27, 2023 - In the 1930s, they changed their name to the American Cabinet Hardware Corporation. In 1940, after years of sustained success despite overall economic hardship, the company combined the words Rockford and American to become Amerock, and used the name in their branding.
